availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Henry Henderson P'Pool (Caldwell County, Kentucky, farmer.)

body.p: Caldwell County, Kentucky, farmer. Virginia native. Married to Sarah S. F. P'Pool. Father of Lucinda A. P'Pool, James H. P'Pool, David A. P'Pool, John H. P'Pool, Alexander P'Pool, Weyman P'Pool, Adella P'Pool, Robert P'Pool, and Harvey P'Pool. Farmer in Caldwell County, Kentucky, in 1850. Farmer in Pollards Tan Yard in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Caldwell County, District 2, p. 358A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Caldwell County, Pollards Tan Yard, p. 152.
"Henry Henderson P'Pool (1814-1882)," Find A Grave, Memorial #50603117, accessed January 20, 2022, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/50603117.
